title: Pegasus Playhouse Season Auditions
description: These auditions will have you considered for Pegasus Playhouse's entire season. Please prepare a solo, and a monologue. Be prepared to dance! Reach out to PegasusPlayhouse@gmail.com to schedule your audition.

title: Romeo and Glurpsnurb
description: The classic forbidden love story with a twist! Performed by a cast of young actors, this all new telling of a true classic will have you smiling ear to ear.

title: Ring of Fire
description: Journey into the heart of American music with Ring of Fire, celebrating the iconic songbook of Johnny Cash. More than just a concert, this rousing revue weaves together over two dozen classic hits – from "I Walk the Line" to the title track – telling powerful stories of love, faith, struggle, and resilience. Experience the Man in Black's legendary sound and spirit brought vividly to life on stage.

title: Guys and Dolls
description: Step into the bustling world of 1940s Times Square, where gamblers like Sky Masterson and Nathan Detroit cross paths with earnest missionaries and nightclub performers. An unlikely bet involving the pious Sarah Brown, a floating crap game, and a long-delayed wedding fuel this classic musical comedy filled with iconic songs and witty charm.

title: Macbeth
description: Delve into the depths of ambition and betrayal with Shakespeare's "Macbeth," directed and adapted by local actor, director, and theatre creator Paul Dunckel. This timeless tragedy explores the corrosive nature of power and the consequences of unchecked desire, as Macbeth grapples with prophecy, guilt, and the unraveling of his humanity. With its themes of fate and free will, this haunting tale prompts reflection on the darker sides of ambition and the fragility of morality.
